1: curl --fail localhost:8787/api/v1/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done < /config/config.xml`

0:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.lobby
  - slashserver.survival
  - slashserver.survival2
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
  family:
  - bungeecord.server.survival
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1eviljungle lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mc-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival SMP'
    address: mcsv-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival2:
    motd: 'Public Survival EZ-mode SMP'
    address: mcsv2-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3eviljungle &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  billimek:
  - admin
  - family
  AnsleyElla:
  - family
  BrinleyHarper:
  - family
1:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.creative
  - slashserver.survival
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN} lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mccr-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival'
    address: mc-survival-minecraft:25565
    restricted: true
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN3} &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  EthanDstroyr:
  - admin

acl url_discovery path /.well-known/caldav /.well-known/carddav
http-request redirect location /remote.php/dav/ code 301 if url_discovery
option http-keep-alive
timeout server 120000ms

0: until nc -w 1 -v $MYSQL_HOST:3306 || nc -w 1 -v $POSTGRES_HOST:5432; do echo "Waiting for database"; done

1: until nc -w 1 -v $POSTGRES_HOST:5432; do echo "Waiting for database"; done

0: animarr_main, authelia, grafana, home_assistant, immich, lidarr_main, nextcloud, postgres, prowlarr_main, radarr_main, sonarr_main, vaultwarden

upstream:
  default:
    - tcp-tls:1dot1dot1dot1.cloudflare-dns.com
    - tcp-tls:dns.google
    - tcp-tls:dns10.quad9.net
conditional:
  mapping:
    {{ SECRET_DOMAIN }}: 192.168.10.1
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/hosts
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ookangzheng/dbl-oisd-nl/master/dbl.txt
    tv:
      - https://gist.githubusercontent.com/wassname/b594c63222f9e4c83ea23c818440901b/raw/1b0afd2aecf3a099f1681b1cf18fc0e6e2fa116a/Samsung%2520Smart-TV%2520Blocklist%2520Adlist%2520(for%2520PiHole)
      - https://gist.githubusercontent.com/wassname/78eeaaad299dc4cddd04e372f20a9aa7/raw/d7863a978993e99d9c77c9001008ce670a3b4c29/LG%2520Smart-TV%2520Blocklist%2520Adlist%2520(for%2520PiHole)
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Perflyst/PiHoleBlocklist/master/SmartTV.txt
      - https://gist.githubusercontent.com/hkamran80/779019103fcd306979411d44c8d38459/raw/e0f084b396bb8ffcb390c8e7272ae96a6c292d10/SmartTV2.txt
    fakenews:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/alternates/fakenews/hosts
clientGroupsBlock:
  default:
    - ads
    - tv
    - fakenews
caching:
  cacheTimeNegative: 30s
prometheus:
  enable: true
bootstrapDns: tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
httpPort: 4000
queryLog:
  type: mysql
  target: ${BLOCKY_DB_USER}:${BLOCKY_DB_PASSWORD}@tcp(${BLOCKY_DB_HOST}:3306)/blocky?charset=utf8mb4&parseTime=True&loc=Local
  logRetentionDays: 7

/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"
